column2: Broken Chain
column3: Broken Chain

column2: To interrupt the supply chain, we'll need to take out several key structures.
column3: To interrupt the supply chain, we'll need to take out several key structures.

column2: Move up to engage the target buildings. Looks like the base has its own defenses.
column3: Move up to engage the target buildings. Looks like the base has its own defenses.

column2: Once you've engaged, expect enemy reinforcements. Oliveira out.
column3: Once you've engaged, expect enemy reinforcements. Oliveira out.

column2: That's everything, Commander. I'll notify {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} that we've succeeded.
column3: That's everything, Commander. I'll notify {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} that we've succeeded.

column2: Damn. We need to abort, Commander, before we suffer any more losses.
column3: Damn. We need to abort, Commander, before we suffer any more losses.

column2: Incoming reinforcements, Commander, and it looks like they're sending in the big guns.
column3: Incoming reinforcements, Commander, and it looks like they're sending in the big guns.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
column3: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

column2: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
column3: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't kidding about this being an ambitious target. Expect serious, well-armed resistance. This will not be easy.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't kidding about this being an ambitious target. Expect serious, well-armed resistance. This will not be easy.

column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: Get to the evac zone
column3: Get to the evac zone

column2: We have a very ambitious target in mind for you: a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} logistical base. Thousands of tons of armor, ammunition, 'Mech parts, and personnel pass through this facility every day, all on its way to front-line fighting units. A strike at this base will seriously hinder the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, possibly even turning the tide of battle completely against them. It will be well-defended, and as soon as the assault begins the enemy will scramble reinforcements.
column3: We have a very ambitious target in mind for you: a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} logistical base. Thousands of tons of armor, ammunition, 'Mech parts, and personnel pass through this facility every day, all on its way to front-line fighting units. A strike at this base will seriously hinder the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, possibly even turning the tide of battle completely against them. It will be well-defended, and as soon as the assault begins the enemy will scramble reinforcements.

column2: Contagion
column3: Contagion

column2: Boss, there's a garbage signal blasting out of that base's transmitters. Want me to put it through?
column3: Boss, there's a garbage signal blasting out of that base's transmitters. Want me to put it through?

column2: NO! Do not let it through! Commander, I suspect the signal contains some kind of virus that caused the facility to go offline.
column3: NO! Do not let it through! Commander, I suspect the signal contains some kind of virus that caused the facility to go offline.

column2: That could also explain the satellite failures. Okay, people, don't answer any calls from outside our secure comms.
column3: That could also explain the satellite failures. Okay, people, don't answer any calls from outside our secure comms.

column2: Commander, Darius: if I'm right, that base will need to be completely destroyed.
column3: Commander, Darius: if I'm right, that base will need to be completely destroyed.

column2: Acknowledged, Dr. Murad. Commander, once you've dealt with the base, Meyer will be on station to pick you up at this LZ.
column3: Acknowledged, Dr. Murad. Commander, once you've dealt with the base, Meyer will be on station to pick you up at this LZ.

column2: I wonder if {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} intended this to happen, or if they were themselves infected?
column3: I wonder if {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} intended this to happen, or if they were themselves infected?

column2: As long as we've wiped out all traces of that signal, I'm not sure I care.
column3: As long as we've wiped out all traces of that signal, I'm not sure I care.

column2: I'd be quite surprised if we never saw that signal again, Darius. It's like bedbugs: the sort of thing that you never quite eradicate.
column3: I'd be quite surprised if we never saw that signal again, Darius. It's like bedbugs: the sort of thing that you never quite eradicate.

column2: We need to pull out and alert our employers about this situation. Containing this signal is their problem, now.
column3: We need to pull out and alert our employers about this situation. Containing this signal is their problem, now.

column2: Picking up some 'Mech signatures. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} livery.
column3: Picking up some 'Mech signatures. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} livery.

column2: Commander, with comms switched off, I have no idea if the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are part of an attack, or additional victims of the signal.
column3: Commander, with comms switched off, I have no idea if the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are part of an attack, or additional victims of the signal.

column2: Listen, XO, all due respect, but they're shooting at our damn 'Mechs. Who cares why? Waste 'em.
column3: Listen, XO, all due respect, but they're shooting at our damn 'Mechs. Who cares why? Waste 'em.

column2: As odd as this sounds... I agree with Mr. Virtanen. Anything that was exposed to that signal needs to be completely destroyed.
column3: As odd as this sounds... I agree with Mr. Virtanen. Anything that was exposed to that signal needs to be completely destroyed.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
column3: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

column2: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
column3: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: I don't like the sound of this, Commander. No satellite coverage means no topographical intel. We're going into an unknown situation without a map.
column3: I don't like the sound of this, Commander. No satellite coverage means no topographical intel. We're going into an unknown situation without a map.

column3: Get to the evac zone

column2: We've just lost contact with one of our facilities, Commander, and we need your help. Earlier today, our facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} received what they believed was a normal data transmission. It was badly garbled, and when they requested it be re-sent, they got no response. Shortly thereafter the base systems began to malfunction, and then we lost contact with both the base and the synchronous satellites covering that region. We'd like you to investigate the facility.
column3: We've just lost contact with one of our facilities, Commander, and we need your help. Earlier today, our facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} received what they believed was a normal data transmission. It was badly garbled, and when they requested it be re-sent, they got no response. Shortly thereafter the base systems began to malfunction, and then we lost contact with both the base and the synchronous satellites covering that region. We'd like you to investigate the facility.

column3: Territorial Claims

column2: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.

column2: Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.
column3: Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.

column2: We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.
column3: Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.

column2: You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.
column3: You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.

column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.

column3: Leave A Mark

column2: We're seeing fixed defenses powering up, Commander. Turrets are such a pain in the ass.
column3: We're seeing fixed defenses powering up, Commander. Turrets are such a pain in the ass.

column2: Take them out, and start doing some damage.
column3: Take them out, and start doing some damage.

column2: There will be a garrison, so keep your eyes open for it. Oliveira out.
column3: There will be a garrison, so keep your eyes open for it. Oliveira out.

column2: That's everything, Commander. Good job.
column3: That's everything, Commander. Good job.

column2: What a disaster. We'll debrief back at the ship.
column3: What a disaster. We'll debrief back at the ship.

column2: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.
column3: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: This seems straightforward, Commander. If things get out of hand, remember you can just blow up the buildings and make a run for it.
column3: This seems straightforward, Commander. If things get out of hand, remember you can just blow up the buildings and make a run for it.

column2: There's a minor {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base in this region, and we'd like to remind them that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is aware of their base and they should not become complacent. Destroying a handful of the facility's structures should send the proper message. The base is likely to be guarded; destroy the units guarding it and there's a bonus in it for you.
column3: There's a minor {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base in this region, and we'd like to remind them that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is aware of their base and they should not become complacent. Destroying a handful of the facility's structures should send the proper message. The base is likely to be guarded; destroy the units guarding it and there's a bonus in it for you.

column2: Reconquest
column3: Reconquest

column2: Commander, our target is just ahead. You need to knock down enough structures to cripple the facility.
column3: Commander, our target is just ahead. You need to knock down enough structures to cripple the facility.

column2: Watch for fixed gun emplacements and enemy defenders. These pirates have nothing to lose, so they'll be desperate.
column3: Watch for fixed gun emplacements and enemy defenders. These pirates have nothing to lose, so they'll be desperate.

column2: There may be additional enemy units deployed away from the base, so keep your eyes open. Oliveira out.
column3: There may be additional enemy units deployed away from the base, so keep your eyes open. Oliveira out.

column2: Well done, Commander. Any remaining pirate forces will have nowhere to hide.
column3: Well done, Commander. Any remaining pirate forces will have nowhere to hide.

column2: That was catastrophic, Commander. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.
column3: That was catastrophic, Commander. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.

column2: As I suspected, Commander. We've picked up additional pirate forces closing on your position.
column3: As I suspected, Commander. We've picked up additional pirate forces closing on your position.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: If there are enough pirates there to present a problem for local authorities, we should be prepared for a tough fight, Commander.

column2: A heavily armed pirate band has taken control of a facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and are using it as a base of operations for raiding and terrorizing nearby settlements. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities do not have the local military resources to assault the base, given how extensively they've entrenched. We need you to destroy the base so that they can no longer use it as a staging area for their criminal acts.
column3: A heavily armed pirate band has taken control of a facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and are using it as a base of operations for raiding and terrorizing nearby settlements. We need you to destroy the base so that they can no longer use it as a staging area for their criminal acts.

column3: Blood Feud

column2: Unknown BattleMech lance, this is a secure facility. Halt and identify yourselves.
column3: Unknown BattleMech lance, this is a secure facility. Halt and identify yourselves.

column2: We're uh, we're turret inspectors. Here to clean your turrets.
column3: We're uh, we're turret inspectors. Here to clean your turrets.

column2: Who is this? What's your operating number?
column3: Who is this? What's your operating number?

column2: Enough, Sumire. Commander, your target is just ahead. Good luck.
column3: Enough, Sumire. Commander, your target is just ahead. Good luck.

column2: Another successful criminal operation in the can, Commander.
column3: Another successful criminal operation in the can, Commander.

column2: Commander, I don't know what happened down there, but we need to extract, now.
column3: Commander, I don't know what happened down there, but we need to extract, now.

column2: Commander, I'm picking up four additional contacts headed your way. Watch out for an ambush.
column3: Commander, I'm picking up four additional contacts headed your way. Watch out for an ambush.

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have just finished a very ambitious operation. They rounded up two dozen members of a rival criminal organization and they're holding them in a secure detention facility. We're not happy with the idea that those scumbags get to live out their lives in comfort and safety behind bars. We want you to give them a bit more severe sentencing.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have just finished a very ambitious operation. They rounded up two dozen members of a rival criminal organization and they're holding them in a secure detention facility. We're not happy with the idea that those scumbags get to live out their lives in comfort and safety behind bars. We want you to give them a bit more severe sentencing.

column2: THE SYSTEM AUTHORITIES HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED OF YOUR INTRUSION.

column2: That could mean reinforcements, Commander. Keep your eyes peeled.
column3: That could mean reinforcements, Commander. Keep your eyes peeled.

column2: One of our sources inside a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} law enforcement facility just reported some alarming news. Somehow, the authorities have gotten their filthy hands on one of our accountants, and they're interrogating him for all our business secrets right now. That's not something we're willing to tolerate. We can't take any chances on this one, Commander. We need you to flatten that facility.
column3: One of our sources inside a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} law enforcement facility just reported some alarming news. Somehow, the authorities have gotten their filthy hands on one of our accountants, and they're interrogating him for all our business secrets right now. That's not something we're willing to tolerate. We can't take any chances on this one, Commander. We need you to flatten that facility.
